column4: so polyp audio was removed and esd took its place again, right guys?
the problem is that after all these changes I can't make esd work anymore
hope it will automatically start at start up from now on
make sure System>Preferences>Sound>Enable sound server startup is checked
then you can do changelog linux-restricted-modules-$(uname -r)
thanks a lot, however I think I won't have to dig into it
you can block IPs at the IP layer. You'd block MAC addresses at the Ethernet layer.
I'm running firestarter, if I manually add ip filters, will firestarter remove them? or ignore them?
it will block those IPs you specify.
